title: Ellar Coltrane Speaks Of Growing Up On Screen In 'Boyhood'
teaser: Film director Richard Linklater's latest movie, Boyhood, was shot over 12 years. NPR's Tamara Keith speaks with the star of the film, Ellar Coltrane, who spent over a decade shooting the movie.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
